mapper.select:
SELECT id id, name name, sex sex, depart depart, position position, authority authority, phone phone, hiredate hiredate, leavedate leavedate, status status, password password FROM ihs_person
name like '%${name}%'
and depart like '%${depart}%'
and position like '%${position}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ihs_person ( name, sex, depart, position, authority, phone, hiredate, leavedate, password ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{sex}, #{depart}, #{position}, #{authority}, #{phone}, #{hiredate}, #{leavedate}, '2017' )
